law.text: The fee for registration of all voters shall be paid to the county clerk by the state in the amount of twenty-five cents ($0.25) for each person registered.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 185, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 202, sec. 2, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 247, sec. 11, effective June 19, 1976. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 14, effective June 21, 1974.

metadata.budget-ref: See State/Executive Branch Budget, 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 117, Pt. I, A, 17, (2) at 616.
